text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hello I'm Adelina an Enterprise support
engineer working in Seattle Washington
today I'm going to show you how to
create and activate an AWS account let's
get started first we're going to open
the Amazon web services homepage choose
create an AWS account note that if you
signed up for AWS recently we'll choose
the option sign into the console if
create a new AWS account is not visible
to you choose sign into a different
account and then choose create a new AWS
account enter your email in the root
user email space and then edit the
account name to your
preference it's important to note that
if your account is a professional AWS
account then it's a best practice to use
the corporate distribution list instead
of personal email address this helps our
company retain access to the AWS account
if an employee changes roles or leaves
the company double check your
information and then choose verify email
address a verification email will be
sent to the email address that you
provided enter the verification code
provided and then choose verify note
that the code may take a few minutes to
arrive to your inbox if the a lotted
time has passed then also check Spam
folders after the account has been
verified it's time to create your
password enter your root user password
and then choose
continue after your new AWS account has
been created it's time to to add your
contact information select personal or
business account note that both personal
and business accounts have the same
features and functions enter your
personal or business information it's
important to note that for AWS business
accounts is a best practice to enter the
company phone number rather than a
personal phone number this helps your
company retain access to the AWS account
if an employee changes roles or leaves
the
company read and accept the AWS customer
agreement
and then choose continue after we've add
the contact information add a payment
method to the account on the billing
information page enter the information
for your preferred payment
method choose verify an add if you want
to use a different billing address for
your AWS billing information choose a
new address and then choose verify and
continue it's important to know that you
can't continue the sign up process until
there's a valid payment method on the
account after the payment method has
been added we will then verify the phone
number on file on the confirm your
identity page select one of the contact
methods to receive a verification code
select your phone number country or
region code from the list enter a phone
number where you can be reached within a
few minutes for verification if you're
given a capture then enter the display
code and submit the automated system
will then contact you enter the pin
received and then click
continue
and now you know how to create and
activate a new AWS account thanks for
watching and happy cloud computing from
all of us here at
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
AWS
